content: Write a poem about dreams with exactly 70 words.

Dreams are like butterflies
Flitting in the night
Sometimes bright and beautiful
Other times, taking flight

They dance in our minds
As we sleep so sound
Bringing joy and wonder
Or fear that can astound

But when we wake up
They fade away so fast
Leaving only memories
Of what was, now past

So cherish your dreams
No matter how they seem
For they are a part of you
In your heart, they'll gleam
